price: (3) In the nearest land.[1140] But they, after their defeat, will overcome
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: [1140]- Another meaning is "in the lowest land."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
